item.title: CyberConnect2 launches 30th anniversary website
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/cyberconnect2-launches-30th-anniversary-website

CyberConnect2 has launched the official website for its 30th anniversary, which it will celebrate on February 16, 2026.

Since its establishment in 1996, CyberConnect2 has developed over 30 games, including the .hack// series, Little Tail Bronx series, Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm series, Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot, the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – Hinokami Chronicles series, and the Fuga: Melodies of Steel series.

The first announcements for the company’s 30th anniversary include a renewed company logo, new vision, new mascot, and an Amazon Wishlist for congratulatory gifts.

Get the details below.

■ One Part Love, One Part Passion, All Entertainment.

CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd., will welcome its 30th anniversary on February 16, 2026.

CyberConnect2 currently has studios in Fukuoka, Tokyo, and Osaka. Since its establishment, the company has developed over thirty video games and has been part of the planning and creation of various entertainment projects including animated movies, manga, and live-action television shows.

CyberConnect2 would like to take this opportunity to express their sincere gratitude to their fans across the world, clients, and friends who have made this possible. Embracing their 30th year, CyberConnect2 will revamp its corporate image and begin operation on a variety of celebratory projects as a way of relaying their thanks to all who supported them along this journey.

Details and updates will be posted regularly on CyberConnect2’s special anniversary website.

CyberConnect2’s 30th Anniversary: The First Announcement and Words of Thanks From CEO Hiroshi Matsuyama

Renewed Company Logo

CyberConnect2’s company logo colors will be renewed to achieve wider recognition.

The new monochromatic logo will maintain the brand’s image while enhancing visibility.

CyberConnect2’s New Vision

“One Part Love, One Part Passion, All Entertainment.”

In addition, CyberConnect2 would like to present their new vision: One Part Love, One Part Passion, All Entertainment.

This vision embraces CyberConnect2’s company spirit and intention of connecting with their fans and bringing them joy through the entertainment the company provides.

A New Character for a Fresh Corporate Image!

Designed by CyberConnect2 artist Higashi (@higashi_cc2), this new character brings together people, kemono, manga and video games to show that CyberConnect2 will extend their reach farther into the field of entertainment than ever before.

The character is an embodiment of the company’s vision and CyberConnect2’s wish to connect with people through their creations.

Plans for exclusive merchandise as well as appearances of the character at upcoming events and campaigns are in full swing.

There will be a public vote to decide on a name for the new character on CyberConnect2’s official X account starting today.

Calling for Illustrations and Messages to Celebrate CyberConnect2’s 30th Anniversary!

Messages from CyberConnect2 fans, industry partners, and friends to celebrate the company’s 30th year would be greatly appreciated. Messages, illustrations, photos and autographs can be sent through a designated form or X (formerly Twitter). Messages will be welcomed throughout the 30th year and will be posted on CyberConnect2’s special anniversary website as well as at events, on promotional blogs, and on other social network platforms.

There will be a lottery every month, and those who have sent celebration messages will be eligible to win special 30th anniversary commemorative items. The company hopes to see many participants join them in the celebration!

How to send messagesReception

Use the designated form on the 30th anniversary special website: Please follow the instructions given on the 30th anniversary special form.

  • Form for Fans
  • Form for Industry Professionals

*The special form on the website is intended only for messages in written text.
*Two forms have been prepared, one for fans and one for industry partners. Please be careful to select the correct form as the contents differ.

Messages through X

Please follow CyberConnect2’s official public relations account (@PR_CC2) and reply with the hashtag “#CC2_30th” to official posts accepting illustrations and messages.

  • Please follow @PR_CC2

Afterwards, please also send a link to your celebratory X post through our 30th anniversary special website’s designated form.

PeriodFrom Monday, February 17, 2025, until Monday, February 16, 2026.

*Messages will be accepted and shared over the course of the entire 30th year.

Note
  • The special 30th anniversary commemorative items can only be sent to an address in Japan.
  • There is no limit to the number of entries per person.
  • Small edits to the original messages may be made without changing the meaning and tone when it is being shared.
  • The special anniversary items will be sent out from April onward.
  • The special anniversary items will be sent through postal package.
  • Only one application for the anniversary items will be accepted per postal address.

CyberConnect2’s Wishlist for the 30th Anniversary!

CyberConnect2 kindly asks that congratulatory bouquets not to be sent for this occasion. The company acknowledges the thoughtfulness behind such gestures and would like to share instead an Amazon Wishlist for anyone so generously inclined. Any gifts received will be greatly appreciated.

The Wishlist consists of items that the company’s creative and development staff will need for welcoming the 30th anniversary. CyberConnect2 promises to take the utmost care of any gifts received and to ensure that they are utilized to their maximum potential for the purpose of bringing joy and entertainment to fans across the globe. A warm thank you in advance to all those who select congratulatory gifts from the Wishlist in lieu of flowers.

  • CyberConnect2’s 30th Anniversary Wishlist

The company will continue to post regular updates for special plans on the 30th anniversary special website.

Thank you for your continued love and support.
